alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 05 at 9:40AM MDT until November 06 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Periods of moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, mainly Saturday afternoon and night. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains...including Highway 40 over Rabbit Ears Pass. * WHEN...From 6 PM MDT this evening to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to icy and snowpacked roads and significantly reduced visibility in areas of snow and blowing snow. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
